website_summaries.verdict: This boat gives you options, with five seats, a canopy, and the option to use as a sun lounger.
pros: Using the cooler helps make it more stable
Seats up to three adults and two kids
Pedal positions for one, two, or three people
Adhesive sealant between deck and hull.Manufactured from High Density Polyethylene (HDPE)Closed cell polystyrene foam flotation
Color coordinated pedal, cranks, bushings, steering handle, and rubrail.Weight capacity: 545 pounds
cons: Consider removing from water and tipping up when not in use or making cover more secure

customer_reviews.title: Arrived a little roughed up, but still excited for it.
customer_reviews.text: Our family is excited to spend some time in this boat in the summer, and I think it will work well. The build seems solid, and everything is well-put-together. It is bigger than I envisioned, but that is fine. Unfortunately there are a few issues. First, the canopy frame is bent out of shape, which I will try to fix myself. Second, the rub rail and one of the seat backs arrived already rashed up a bit; nothing to do about that I guess. Finally, one of the paddles is cracked and broken. I will contact the seller (or hope they contact me after reading the review) and request a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Spaulding

customer_reviews.title: We love this boat!
customer_reviews.text: We love this!!! I really like the canopy to protect us from the hot sun and I like that the seats can be adjusted for taller people. A couple of the drink holders are kind of shallow- prob only use for a beer can, but that's okay....
customer_reviews.author: Kate Ellingson

customer_reviews.title: Holes in the bottom of boact
customer_reviews.text: The boat arrived damaged. It has obviously been damaged by a fork lift. It was also filthy when it arrived. Trying to return but am not getting any confirmation of the return.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: pedal boat
customer_reviews.text: When I received the padel boat the rudder bar is so bent that the boat will go in circles, rudder also bent, scratches all over the bottom of the boat. Not sure if I can fix it to work right. Paddling In a circle isn't what I had in mind!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sun Dolphin pedal boat
customer_reviews.text: It's fun and cool but it's no surprise that rain water fills it up. Then it can't be drained without getting it out of the water. If it's next to a dock, that can be a pain. I bought a cover which seems to fit well but blows up on the sides with heavy winds letting the water in. I took the advice of another reviewer and added velcro which helps. Next year we'll leave it up on shore with the plug out during the rainy season. We have found that it's best to alternate who pedals cause every person has their own speed. And it's quick to respond to the rudder.
customer_reviews.author: catsnout

customer_reviews.title: We love out boat
customer_reviews.text: We love out boat. Kids were able to figure it out and get moving pretty quick. Its light enough that my two little girls can carry it around with out too much complaining. Canopy is strong. Clips on straps that hold canopy could be stronger, but I am not going to complain too much about some clips I can replace for next to nothing. Happy with out purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nail in bottom of boat
customer_reviews.text: got it today..very scratched up.. which i can live with...NAIL IN THE BOTTOM OF THE BOAT ALL THE WAY THRU..SO CANT USE IT...also a 3 person boat not 5 person boat..j hayes in altoona iowa got my boat thanks to a delivery mix up..hope u are enjoying it buddy! IM OUT 700 DOLLARS! I WILL WRITE A BETTER REVIEW IF THEY CORRECT THE PROBLEM.
customer_reviews.author: Tracyloghry

customer_reviews.title: paddle boat delivered in a van and damaged!
customer_reviews.text: The paddle boat was delivered in a van, the van had other creates in it and the paddle boats paddle side was right up against a large create which broke one of the paddles. also there are black rub marks and scrapes and dents on the canopy alum. cover. there are black scrapes on the grey trim all around the unit because the unit was delivered in a tor very thin plastic bag with torn holes in it so.............the sides of the boat scraped on the bottom of the van and creates the whole time during the drive. cheap company that takes no thought to packing or insuring no damages when being delivered.
customer_reviews.author: daniel

customer_reviews.title: fun and exercise all in one
customer_reviews.text: It's like riding a recumbent bicycle. Great exercise and I can fish while doing it. Was not happy about the delivery. We live at Lake of the Ozarks in Camdenton and we do not stay there full time yet. The delivery company only delivers on Wednesday and then we were the last delivery. We did not get our boat until 8 or 8:30 pm. But we finally got it and love it.
customer_reviews.author: Melodee D. Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Great wedding gift
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our daughter and new son-in-law from their wedding registry. They take it out constantly. They love the cooler and fishing pole holders. They have even pulled an intertube behind them with an extra passenger. They say it was the best gift they received hands down. Not super lightweight but they get it in the back of their small pick up and will put in on a small trailer when they get one. Very sturdy and should last for many years to come. Delivery was smooth and as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Karen H

customer_reviews.title: Although the packaging sucked, the boat arrived undamaged
customer_reviews.text: Although the packaging sucked, the boat arrived undamaged, right on my driveway. Lots of fun on the lakes around. Think about bicycling on a lake, with a full cooler in the back row. You can even lay back and keep peddling. Davis lake, Sardines lake, Gold lake in California
customer_reviews.author: Mr.N

customer_reviews.title: OMG! Love this boat!
customer_reviews.text: This boat is great, and with the price and free shipping, you can't beat it. Everyone in our family loves it....even the dogs. Canopy is a little flimsy, but works well when we need it (which is not very often). The only thing to make it better would be some kind of weight on the very front end. If you get too much weight in the back, the nose comes up out of the water a bit and the boat does not go as well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too much fun
customer_reviews.text: Awesome way to spend an afternoon in the sun. Whether pedaling along, or reclining back and soaking up the rays.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Awesome For Kids
customer_reviews.text: Great boat. Perfect for kids to be able to get out onto the lake and explore and be safe. Virtually untipable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So thrilled with this paddle boat!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely a dream!! Arrived in great condition! Exactly what we hoped for our families to enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Gaga

customer_reviews.title: The kids LOVE it!
customer_reviews.text: We used a similar pedal boat when we went on our Girl Scout Camporee last month and we knew we had to get one of our own for the lake. It has been a huge hit with the neighborhood kids! You do have to be sure that you take it out of the water after use and pull the plug once in a while to drain it. If not, it will be waterlogged and move slowly on the water. It is a bit hard for me to do on my own because it is heavy and bulky but two adults can manage the task easily. Great little boat and the canopy is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Eileen E Thoresen

customer_reviews.title: Funnest little thing EVER!
customer_reviews.text: So much fun for our family! Everyone loves this, even the toddlers! Great exercise, too!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Kay

customer_reviews.title: Totally UNACCEPTABLE DAMAGED ITEM
customer_reviews.text: This item was shipped 3x damaged with large cracks and hole in boat . This item was ordered as a gift for my grandkids.
customer_reviews.author: Chatman

customer_reviews.title: Works great as avertised.
customer_reviews.text: Liked the adjustable seats since many different boaters will use. Does definitely hold five people and three can pedal at the same time. Cooler is nice and fishing rod holders are a benefit. Steering is simple. Weighs 110 lbs. and two people can handle and launch rather easily. Came with a couple of black scratch marks on the gunwale, but I think soap and water will take these off. Only used it a few times, but so far completely satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Canopy
customer_reviews.text: My order specifically said Blue Canopy but I received a Gray canopy so it doesn't match and look like a set. Also arrived dirty, which I wasn't thrilled about cleaning a brand new boat.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Best Little Boat
customer_reviews.text: Needed a little boat for our pond and this is perfect. So much fun to pedal around the pond. Only wish the cup holders were deeper. Boat arrived in perfect condition and earlier than expected. Would definitely recommend for anyone looking for a small boat. The kids loved it too!
customer_reviews.author: Cajun Queen

customer_reviews.title: Summer into fall exercise and fun
customer_reviews.text: Ready to go out of the carton. Canopy can be up or down. (I prefer up so that I won't feel as if I'm in a floating cooler.). My five dogs love to go for a ride. I'm a woman in my late fifties and I can get it in and out of the water by myself.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Levin

customer_reviews.title: the boat was just what I expected, however there ...
customer_reviews.text: the boat was just what I expected, however there were numerous scraps and gouges. if it was in a store I would have been looking for a discount or I would have rejected it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GRAY canopy, NOT blue like in picture
customer_reviews.text: GRAY canopy! Not BLUE like in picture that I ordered!! HATE gray! Other than that, it’s great
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this product. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Great way to get a little exercise while appreciating the water and nature.
customer_reviews.author: Mother Dear

customer_reviews.title: This boat is very good quality. we love it so much
customer_reviews.text: This boat is very good quality. we love it so much .not to heavy which is good! THANK YOU you made our dreams come true!
customer_reviews.author: Britney

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and value--with adjustable seats and canopy, no less! Usually seats like this and canopies are only found on pricier models. It arrived without incident, and I cannot wait to use it!!
customer_reviews.author: Canny shopper

customer_reviews.title: great boat
customer_reviews.text: bought this boat for my wifes birthday we live on a small lake in florida she loves this boat its light weight makes it easy for her to handle. the removable seats make it east to lay out and sun bathe all the neighbors tell her they need to buy one of these boats
customer_reviews.author: john hatfield

customer_reviews.title: Buy extended warranty at time of purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Should have bought the extended service plan as I didn't think to do so when I bought it. No problems so far but for the amount of money that I spent, I would have given me peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie McClarren

customer_reviews.title: Nice pedal boat
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful customer service to resolve a slight issue I had. I love this pedal boat in the back of my lake.
customer_reviews.author: Katwin

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great Pedal Boat, delivered on time and in perfect condition. Easy to use and enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Tabora Mears

customer_reviews.title: Great for fishing
customer_reviews.text: I love this boat. It will only comfortable hold two adults. If you have young children (5 or under) they should be able to fit in the back. However, I don't have any children so this is perfect for me and my boyfriend to take out fishing. You can seat the poles in the two pole holders for hands free trolling. Also, it fits in the back of his truck so I don't even need a trailer. I would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pedal boat
customer_reviews.text: Great boat, easy to pedal and steer even through lily pads. Easy to move around on land with two people. Came exactly as pictured and described. Delivery was on time, they put the boat where I wanted it and took away all packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Karen C

customer_reviews.title: More than 2 people doesn't work well!
customer_reviews.text: Its a cool boat, but it says its good for 4 people! The truth is... if there are more than 2 adult size people in it with any type of extra gear, its becomes way to heavy and slow for just two people to paddle....! Better off buying a small boat with a motor....
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Wiley

customer_reviews.title: great fun, we have enjoyed it and look forward ...
customer_reviews.text: great fun, we have enjoyed it and look forward to many more years
customer_reviews.author: Promise Point

customer_reviews.title: This fits on top of our jeep perfectly! Only ...
customer_reviews.text: This fits on top of our jeep perfectly! Only complaint is the fabric on the canopy frayed along a seam.
customer_reviews.author: V. Castelo

customer_reviews.title: lots of fun. very stable
customer_reviews.text: lots of fun. very stable. be sure and buy a cover so that it doesn't fill up with water if you keep it docked. no matter how hard you peddle, it has just one speed. relaxing.
customer_reviews.author: VDB

customer_reviews.title: great little boat, hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: I've had this pedal boat for about six months now and it has been useful (for pond cleaning) and fun (for kids). It arrived promptly and in great condition -- the canopy was installed backwards, but we quickly figured it out and reattached it. I would like it if the boat were lighter so I could tip it up more easily to hose it out. It is very hard for one person to tip it on edge.
customer_reviews.author: bobsmom

customer_reviews.title: Well made great little boat
customer_reviews.text: Well made great little boat......... Can buy the same thing for the same money , or maybe a little less, at Tractor Supply.
customer_reviews.author: George Shaffer

customer_reviews.title: It’s fun for kids
customer_reviews.text: It’s fun for kids.Suitable for use in the lake, very comfortable, no need to use a lot of effort to make it move
customer_reviews.author: A niu

customer_reviews.title: good times for all
customer_reviews.text: We received this item on Friday and took it out on Saturday, it was a hit! The canopy is a must have for hot summer days, and there is plenty of room for the whole family. Just make sure there is even weight distribution or you will be riding sideways. The package came as described and before estimated delivery date. The price was also more then fair. The next item we plan on buying is a small trolling motor, although the exercise is fun, going across an entire lake did get a little tired some. Hope you enjoy as much as we do.
customer_reviews.author: ADAMS

customer_reviews.title: Great Boat
customer_reviews.text: Ours was delivered exactly as stated. The only thing I didn't like it the caribeeners (sp) that hold the awning to the boat. They are plastic and flimsy. Replaced with small allow one's. Easy !
customer_reviews.author: Todd Butler

customer_reviews.title: Friendly delivery people
customer_reviews.text: Friendly delivery people. Great fun on the lake with this boat!
customer_reviews.author: Penny Fields

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice paddle boat. Decent price. Me ND my husband take it to ponds and fish
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomerHeatherWilliamson

customer_reviews.title: Very well built
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy construction, lots of fun for the whole family. Easy to clean. Try and get a waterproof cover so you can keep the boat clean while not in use or when it rains.
customer_reviews.author: RoxyBee Loves

customer_reviews.title: Product good but delivery needs work.
customer_reviews.text: Product was good but delivery left a lot to be desired. I had no confirmation of delivery. no sure I would do this again.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Killeen

customer_reviews.title: Sun Slider Lounger Pedal Boat-5 seat
customer_reviews.text: Great exercise, takes the place of a stationary bike; difference being is you actually get somewhere! The wife and I love this "boat". We bought it primarily for day trips to the lake and fishing. After the first voyage, we both decided we would opt for a trolling motor. Bought a Minn Kota 30-36 ( 30# force and a 36" shaft) and it works good, as an assist or by itself. The grandkids love the boat and never seem to run out of energy. We don't give them the trolling motor option....Super price and really fast shipping. we received ours 5 days after on-line order.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: wonderful pedal boat
customer_reviews.text: bought this for the small lake on our country property. the canopy and fishing rod holders make all the difference. have already made many great memories in this little boat and look forward to making more. Highly recommend this to anyone looking for a great pedal boat
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: GOOD AND BAD
customer_reviews.text: WE'VE HAD A LOT OF FUN ON THIS BOAT,BUT ANYTHING THAT COULD RUST,DID RUST.IT IS VERY STABLE EVEN WITH A 50 LB THRUST MOTOR ON THE BACK,ALTHOUGH IN ANY ROUGH WATER IT TENDS TO RIDE RIGHT OVER THE FRONT OF THE BOAT BECAUSE OF THE SHAPE.ALL IN ALL,IT'S NOT BAD FOR THE PRICE.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Boat
customer_reviews.text: Great little boat, so much fun. Arrived when scheduled, no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very cool product. Have had lots of fun with the family on this guy. Check around on price. After i bought this one, i saw it at Academy for less.
customer_reviews.author: Han Solo

customer_reviews.title: Happy 😊
customer_reviews.text: Just got it. Looks nicer than expected. I am happy 😊
customer_reviews.author: TheJohnHurlow

customer_reviews.title: Bought this as a house warming gift
customer_reviews.text: my brother in law is 400 pounds and the thing is sturdy as can be....hero gift for cheap and he can fish from it
customer_reviews.author: Ken B.

customer_reviews.title: liked it, but didn't love it
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this to take my family of four out on the lake. Although it fits four people fine, the weight of four people makes it a chore to get anywhere. You pedal and pedal and you hardly move because the boat is weighted down. I'm the heaviest at 200 lbs. My wife is about 110 and my kids are 60 and 50lbs. The paddlewheel needs to be bigger. Its small size does not move enough water which makes it harder to go anywhere. The boat itself is not that heavy. However I ended up selling it and bought kayaks instead.
customer_reviews.author: midd

customer_reviews.title: Fun little boat
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality pedal boat. Adjustable seat backs makes it comfortable. The canopy top is a nice feature keeping you out of the hot sun of Texas. We have had a lot of fun on the little guy.
customer_reviews.author: larry c goodwin

customer_reviews.title: Great boat for the value!
customer_reviews.text: Got our boat yesterday (despite horrible shipping experience from Amazon on this product). It is very nicely made and seems like it will hold up well on the lake. Was not thrilled that I had to go to a website to find the user manual. For the price, you would think a 6 page booklet could have been included. For two adults, it is balanced very well -- with just one adult however, it seems to lean quite a bit to that side. Not sure how it would be out on the lake vs pond with just one person. It is very lightweight for its size and we look forward to many years of use!
customer_reviews.author: Kellie J Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: We have moved away from our home on the lake, so we sold this, but we had some great times on this thing, from fishing to sunbathing, and just enjoying peaceful times on the water. It held 4 adults with ease. It was a wonderful purchase and we would make it again!!
customer_reviews.author: AmaGzon Customer GH

customer_reviews.title: padal boat
customer_reviews.text: great boat. easy to use and manuever..fun for all in the family. see lots of use of it in the coming months.
customer_reviews.author: Greg T.

customer_reviews.title: great fun lots of work
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time in great shape. Grandchildren arrived next day. More grandchildren the next week. All totally enjoyed it, encluding me and my children. Had it tied to dock when bad storm came. Cover slipped and filled front of boat. Lake level rose. Front of boat sank. Water came in through seams. I was able to dip out water on top but found there was no drain plug. Boat needs to have better sealed seams and a drain plug!!!
customer_reviews.author: retired grandmother

customer_reviews.title: KL Industries sun slider
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use. My 3 & 5 year old grandchildren can handle it quite easily. Plan on getting a lot more use out of it next spring!
customer_reviews.author: vee raleigh

customer_reviews.title: Everyone loves the boat. No problem for the kids ...
customer_reviews.text: Everyone loves the boat. No problem for the kids to handle. Also works well with the electric motor bought from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Neat little boat!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered via amazon at $610 delivered. Found it to be better than expected. Nice little boat that is just perfect for puttering around on our small lake. I added the trolling motor, battery box, try up lanyard kit, and an anchor. Neat.
customer_reviews.author: Picard321

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: This little boat is so much fun. We love it!! But I will have to say that it takes at least two adults to pick up the boat. Plan on at least three!!!
customer_reviews.author: Janis

customer_reviews.title: Great boat only needing minor accessory alterations.
customer_reviews.text: Everything works as it should. Very easy to pedal if load is distributed well - four adults in it would require a counterweight at the front of the boat for maximum paddle to water contact. The only improvements I would like to see would be deeper cup holders and another tie off point located at the stern, so that when docked it isn't just tied off at the front allowing it to turn. Both of these are alterations I can make on my own though. All in all we are very pleased and have enjoyed many outings on our lake!
customer_reviews.author: HMICKLER

customer_reviews.title: I am happy with the boat
customer_reviews.text: I got the boat in less than a week after my order and I was surprised because some reviewers said they waited 3 months. The boat functions well and appears exactly like it on the Amazon site. I found some damaged piece from one of the 4 paddles under the boat, contacted the company, the customer service person was nice and offered me several remedy options. I am happy with the boat in general. I will shoot some images from this one and try to post them on the site.
customer_reviews.author: Some what high

customer_reviews.title: Poor delivery and leaking hull
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this paddle boat and was impressed with the free delivery. Boat was not delivered as promised and after several days of rain in Southwest Florida the boats hull filled with water while sitting on my dock. Cover does not stay on in thunderstorms. Cannot believe all the positive reviews. Only 2 other reviewers mention the water in the hull problem. Very poor design for a boat !!
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The quality and service professionals are perfect, but the delivery have 1 star
customer_reviews.author: Juan Carlos Fiallos

customer_reviews.title: KL Pedal Boat with canopy
customer_reviews.text: For the price we were very happy with it. It is what they described and it came when they said it would.
customer_reviews.author: jonathan r jordan

customer_reviews.title: My Baby sitter
customer_reviews.text: My baby sitter is loved by the high school and grade school. Truck unload an it was a hit. You see,I live by the high school and my grandchildren and all there frinds lined up to take it to spotted eagle, our town lake. My pedal boat only comes home at night, like the children to rest and gone in the morning, all summer it has been a blast. Ages ten years to seventy two years, O! O! yes, I grandma use it too. Will have to purchase another one next year. Thanks KL Industries Sun Slider Pedal Boat, it's safe, sturdy and fun.
customer_reviews.author: grandmabev

customer_reviews.title: D. Gary
customer_reviews.text: Received the item and it fulfilled it expections, The kids love it, If you ride one person they have to sit in the middle so it will steer . It is plastic upper and lower, It looks cheap but it does what it is suppose to. I would recommend it for playing.
customer_reviews.author: Darryl Gary

customer_reviews.title: Lori from Montana
customer_reviews.text: I was thrilled with this boat and the fact that I got free shipping, I have 6 grandsons that I gave this to for Christmas this year, VERY HAPPY BOYS thanks
customer_reviews.author: Lori Alice

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: So happy with the my purchase! Amazon delivered as promised! Had the sun dolphin 5 and was to small! The seating will handle 5 people easy! The boat was in plastic and perfect condition! Delivery guys were great! Easy to store and handle. Would of liked a small pontoon but nowhere to store it.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Steiger

customer_reviews.title: so much fun! Need to modify for trolling motor though
customer_reviews.text: so much fun! Need to modify for trolling motor though.
customer_reviews.author: GP

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: Just like reviews mentioned, ready to go out of the box. Light enough that we could lift it and place it in the intercaostal canal and off we went. Easy enough that a 9 and 10 year old could use it on their own, Came within days in perfect condition. Was excellent. Highly recommended.MK
customer_reviews.author: MARCI K.

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Great and easy to use product and shipping was good too. But it is very heavy.
customer_reviews.author: STEPHEN MARTIN

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our grandkids!
customer_reviews.text: They love being able to peddle it around the lake on their own without needing an adult driver with them all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Gia

customer_reviews.title: CUTE !
customer_reviews.text: Came by LARGE truck...you will need a place for them to deliver to. Its very cute...can't wait to try it out...Wait til my Rotweiler finds out its a boat and not a golf cart :)
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: transit problems
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun and great way to get exercise and be with your family. Warning...The seat backs are not secure. The first time I took this boat out, one seat back came off and was hit by another car, destroying it. Apparently this is not a defect ( I think it is ), so the company did not replace it. The cost for one seat back is $46.00. So, if you buy this boat and decide to transport it to the pond or lake, make sure you secure each seat back, or better yet, remove them in transit.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Almost everything about this boat works great. Only complaint I have is the trolling motor mount doesn't work that well. But don't let that spoil you from getting one.
customer_reviews.author: E. Hartwell

customer_reviews.title: KL Sun Slider Pedal Boat with Canopy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this pedal boat on Amazon.com last month...only got to use it 2 times. The grand kids loves it...they want to stay out on the water all day...we pack up food and drinks and have a blast with them....making all kinds of memories...we all love the time spent together...Amazon was great and shipped very timely. If you want great family fun...this is it! All kids.. old and young will enjoy this boat....G-pa and I want to take it out fishing....first chance we get
customer_reviews.author: hatcher46

customer_reviews.title: Looks perfect
customer_reviews.text: Good service. As advertised, and I will tell you more this summer when a new set of little kids use it.
customer_reviews.author: sid morrison

customer_reviews.title: Kl Industries Sun Slider Pedal Boat
customer_reviews.text: We love our boat. It arrived a week before the estimated date in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: T. Denning

customer_reviews.title: great choice
customer_reviews.text: This product is the cream of the crop when it comes to peddle boats :) great features such as: fishing pole holders, drink holders, cooler, removable seats, adjustable seats, canopy, light weight
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: This paddle boat was not easy to recieve
customer_reviews.text: This paddle boat was not easy to recieve. First of all they returned it for some reason that was not clearly explained. Then when they did resend it the box was open and ther was water in the boat. After the frustration of having it sent back the first time I did not want to send it back again. Otherwise the paddle boat works as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie H.

customer_reviews.title: Purchase
customer_reviews.text: It was a great buy.Boat arrived quickly. Great for family outings.Plenty of room for people and also great for fishing!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: not for gulf
customer_reviews.text: We live in the MS Sound and bought this so we could paddle about 2000 feet to a small island in the sound.needless to say we made it over and back in about 2 hours. Not what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: where is my order??
customer_reviews.text: I was supposed to receive this package on August 15th??? I am not able to track the package. I am wandering if I should return it before receiving along with the accessories I bought with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

product_meta.title: Sun Dolphin Sun Slider 5 Seat Pedal Boat with Canopy
product_meta.description:
This Sun Dolphin 5-Person Sun Slider Pedal Boat offers a canopy to shield you from the sun's rays. It has adjustable/reclining seating for three adults and two kids with pedal positions for one, two or three people. There is a built-in cooler or storage area with beverage holders to make your ride a smooth and peaceful one. .


***Important information when placing your order***


Please verify address and telephone# are accurate. The carriers will contact the phone number on the order to set up a delivery appointment. If this information is inaccurate, there is a possibility that your order will be delayed or cancelled with a possible fee incurred at the sellers discretion.
feature_bullets: Adjustable/reclining seating for 3 adults and 2 kids
Pedal positions for 1, 2 or 3 people. Capacity - 530 Pounds(247kg)
Built-in cooler or storage area with beverage holders to make your ride a smooth and peaceful one
Rugged UV-stabilized Fortiflex High Density Polyethylene deck and hull
***IMPORTANT – phone number is needed to schedule a delivery appointment***
